DOC.brief_title: Delayed Start Versus Conventional Antagonist Protocol Poor Responders Pretreated Estradiol Luteal Phase
DOC.detailed_description: 40 patient attend IVF center 2013 & 2014 fulfilling criterion poor response fail go OPU give < 3 mature follicle dose 300U GN . All patient revise history , examination investigation , include age , type duration infertility , day 3 FSH , Day 3 E2 , AMH , AFC All patient 35 year old ore We exclude patient > 44ys , AMH < 0.3ng/ml , FSH > 13 , also patient DM , endometriosis , general disease exclude , local uterine anomaly exclude . All patient receive OCP one cycle Then take estradiol tablet 2 mg one week prior menses test cycle Day 21 day 28 Then divide 2 group US do exclude cyst follicle > 10mm First group receive 300 U r FSH +150 U urinary GN day 2 till day HCG , dose adjust accord response 0.25 cetrotide S.c add lead follicle reach > 12 mm , HCG give least 3 mature follicle > 14 mm lead one > 17mm OPU do 36 hr HCG , oocytes denuded fertilize ICSI avoid low fertilization rate conventional IVF , embryo transfer do day 3 least one embryo GI wise cancel ET , cyclogest 800mg give intravaginal 14 day quantitative BHCG do consider positive > 5miu/ML 28 day ET , TVS do confirm ongoing pregnancy visualization IU sac . Second group receive cetrotide 0.25 mg s.c alone day 2 day 8then initiate GN therapy initial GN dose ( 300FSH+150U urinary GN ) .same adjustment dose do antagonist restart DF > 12mm , till day HCG , HCG , OPU , ET do method criterion , luteal support follow .
DOC.criteria: 1 Poor responder 2 . Age > 35 year 1. patient > 44ys , 2 . AMH < 0.3ng/ml , 3 . FSH > 13 , also 4. patient DM , endometriosis , general disease exclude , 5. local uterine anomaly exclude .
